categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Poul Ashanto was a pilot who served in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. A student at the Imperial Academy, Ashanto was friends with Sax Hastur, with whom they were best friends, and Alois Akrone on Prefsbelt. Ashanto was killed before the Galactic Civil War, and his hologram was on the wall of honor in the bar "Zero Angle". Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Akrone remembered the pilots in the "Zero corner".
